name: Escape This
description: Escape This is a casual puzzle game.
minimum_requirements: Minimalne: System operacyjny: Windows 7,8,10 Procesor: AMD FX 6300 Pamięć: 500 MB RAM Karta graficzna: GTX 750TI DirectX: Wersja 11 Miejsce na dysku: 60 MB dostępnej przestrzeni
recommended_requirements: Zalecane: System operacyjny: Windows 7,8,10 Procesor: Intel Core i5 6600K Pamięć: 700 MB RAM Karta graficzna: GTX 950 DirectX: Wersja 11 Miejsce na dysku: 60 MB dostępnej przestrzeni

reviews.review_text: This is an interesting game from a certain point of view. I enjoyed playing it, does have a special graphic and great game mechanics, the overall sound is good. Keeps you entertained and satisfied.

Escape This is a game that I recommend because: - it is a method to banish boredom - it has a good price - it has strategy - it is indie & casual - it is a good puzzle game - it has trading cards  Enjoy!
nice game , it deserves a try !
1.Install game 2.Play game 3.Got pushed by a bullet 4.Died & Respawn 5.Touch a Red block 6.Din't Die 7.Touch it again 8.Died 9.Got a 100% Achievements
I must be pretty good at this, becuase I attained 5/5 achievements in four minutes.
One of the worst games I've ever played. Thank gosh i got this in a bundle and it gave me card drops.
Please for your own safety do NOT buy this game... Do NOT even touch it,EVER! Except if you don't want your life and you want to die while playing..
